00001 /* fusion-mcfarling.cpp: McFarling selection table [McFarling, DEC-WRL TN36]
00002    NOTE: number of component predictors must equal two */
00003 /*
00004  * __COPYRIGHT__ GT
00005  */
00006 
00007 #define COMPONENT_NAME "mcfarling"
00008 
00009 #ifdef BPRED_PARSE_ARGS
00010 if(!strcasecmp("mcfarling",type))
00011 {
00012   int num_entries;
00013 
00014   if(sscanf(opt_string,"%*[^:]:%[^:]:%d",name,&num_entries) != 2)
00015     fatal("bad fusion options string %s (should be \"mcfarling:name:num_entries\")",opt_string);
00016   return new fusion_mcfarling_t(name,num_pred,num_entries);
00017 }
00018 #else
00019 
00020 class fusion_mcfarling_t:public fusion_t
00021 {
00022   protected:
00023   int meta_size;
00024   int meta_mask;
00025   my2bc_t * meta;
00026 
00027   public:
00028 
00029   /* CREATE */
00030   fusion_mcfarling_t(char * const arg_name,
00031                      const int arg_num_pred,
00032                      const int arg_meta_size
00033                     )
00034   {
00035     init();
00036 
00037     /* verify arguments are valid */
00038     CHECK_PPOW2(arg_meta_size);
00039     if(arg_num_pred != 2)
00040       fatal("mcfarling fusion only valid for two component/direction predictors");
00041 
00042     name = strdup(arg_name);
00043     if(!name)
00044       fatal("couldn't malloc fusion mcfarling name (strdup)");
00045     type = strdup("McFarling tournament selection");
00046     if(!type)
00047       fatal("couldn't malloc fusion mcfarling type (strdup)");
00048 
00049     num_pred = arg_num_pred;
00050     meta_size = arg_meta_size;
00051     meta_mask = meta_size-1;
00052     meta = (my2bc_t*) calloc(meta_size,sizeof(my2bc_t));
00053     if(!meta)
00054       fatal("couldn't malloc mcfarling meta-table");
00055     bits =  meta_size*2;
00056   }
00057 
00058   /* DESTROY */
00059   ~fusion_mcfarling_t()
00060   {
00061     free(meta); meta = NULL;
00062   }
00063 
00064   /* LOOKUP */
00065   FUSION_LOOKUP_HEADER
00066   {
00067     int index = PC&meta_mask;
00068     int meta_direction = MY2BC_DIR(meta[index]);
00069     bool pred = preds[meta_direction];
00070     BPRED_STAT(lookups++;)
00071     scvp->updated = false;
00072     return pred;
00073   }
00074 
00075   /* UPDATE */
00076   FUSION_UPDATE_HEADER
00077   {
00078     int index = PC&meta_mask;
00079 
00080     if(!scvp->updated)
00081     {
00082         BPRED_STAT(updates++;)
00083         BPRED_STAT(num_hits += our_pred == outcome;)
00084         scvp->updated = true;
00085     }
00086 
00087     /* meta table only updated when predictors disagree. If both
00088        agree, then either both are right, or both are wrong: in
00089        either case the meta table is not updated. */
00090     if(preds[0]^preds[1])
00091     {
00092       MY2BC_UPDATE(meta[index],(preds[1]==outcome));
00093     }
00094   }
00095 
00096 };
00097 
00098 #endif /* BPRED_PARSE_ARGS */
00099 #undef COMPONENT_NAME
